Plot: Realizing the urban legend of their youth has actually come true; two filmmakers delve into the mystery surrounding five missing children and the real-life boogeyman linked to their disappearances.
Title: Cropsey
Actors: Joshua Zeman, Barbara Brancaccio, Bill Ellis, Dorothy D'Eletto
tomatoConsensus: Riveting and bone-chillingly creepy, Cropsey manages to be one of the best documentaries and one of the best horror movies of the year.
